data.title: Prior Scientific on LinkedIn: Prior Scientific's integrated design and manufacturing facilities means we…
data.meta_description: Prior Scientific's integrated design and manufacturing facilities means we control the entire process from start to finish, allowing us to partner with the…
data.text:
As well as supplying high-quality microscopy and imaging components, we are the manufacturing partner for many leading instrumentation companies and institutions. Contract manufacturing with Prior Scientific is risk-free and cost-effective because you don’t need capital investment to get started while also benefiting from our efficiencies of scale. We have high volume capabilities with over 54,000 ft² of manufacturing space that supports precision machining and assembly, and we are always on hand to offer expert advice for improving components or reducing your manufacturing costs. We deliver direct to your worldwide customers and have offices in Europe, North America, Japan, and China for local support. Find out more: https://lnkd.in/eYzyKtWX #microscopy #imaging #embeddedsystems #OEM #automation #semiconductor #inspection #photonics #machinevision #qualitycontrol #imagingmodule #lifescience #digitalmicroscope

Join us as we proudly sponsor the ICR Conference 2024 and support efforts to bring better and kinder treatments to people living with cancer. The Institute of Cancer Research is a UK charity and one of the most influential cancer research organizations. This year’s event will focus on AI and how it is enhancing research, providing new opportunities in clinics, as well as ethical considerations. Around 400 ICR staff and students will come together to celebrate their multidisciplinary collaboration and discuss the latest developments in cancer research. In the field of cancer research, Prior is working with numerous partners who are advancing the capabilities of researchers and clinicians via novel imaging techniques, assays, and analysis methods. We are sponsoring the ICR's plenary session ‘Cell and Structural Biology in silico’ and will be available to speak with guests in the poster presentation area. We look forward to seeing you there! #CancerResearch #CancerTreatment #MedicalAdvancements #HealthcareIndustry

Are you attending #Elmi2024 this year? Join us at this key event for scientists and developers and learn how our precision positioning and imaging automation capabilities can support your work. The European Light Microscopy Initiative promotes the developing field of light microscopy and aims to strengthen communication between researchers, core facilities and industry. Visit us at Stand 12, Hall 2A, at the ACC Liverpool- we look forward to meeting you!
